title: Ecommerce website
description: This project is a comprehensive eCommerce application built using React,redux, redux-toolkit, and Tailwind-CSS. It features a user-friendly interface with essential components such as a home page, product catalog, shopping cart, and user authentication (login, registration, password management). The platform integrates Stripe for secure payments and includes an admin dashboard for managing roles, and CRUD operations on products, categories, and brands, including image uploads. Users can also leave comments on products, while access levels ensure differentiated user experiences

title: Nike Landing Page
description: A fully responsive and interactive landing page for showcasing Nike's latest collection. Built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, this project emphasizes modern design, smooth performance, and scalability.

title: Portfolio website
description: This portfolio website is designed for an Android developer, featuring a fully responsive in all devices. The site includes customizable settings, such as an option to adjust the font size throughout the website, catering to individual user preferences. Enhanced with various animations. Also Itâ€™s Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, Bootstrap for responsive design and FormSpree for efficient form handling.

title: courses landing page
description: This template is designed to display courses and highlight the offerings of a course center. It features a fully responsive design, ensuring an optimal viewing experience across all devices. Developed using HTML and CSS, the template utilizes media queries to adapt its layout and style for various screen sizes, making it accessible and user-friendly on both desktop and mobile devices.

title: Restaurant website
description: A fully responsive landing page for a restaurant, responsive for all devices. Utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with jQuery and Bootstrap for enhanced styling and responsiveness. Features include a countdown timer for events, AOS for smooth section animations, and Owl Carousel for an interactive image slider.
